help-file.title: "GROUP RECALL"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <group> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Teleportation
The caster and his entire group will instantly be transported back to the place the caster is "homed" at. The caster must be grouped last or everyone grouped after him will be left behind. They must also be strong of will and body to effectively transport their fellow members through the mists of magic to safety.
WARNING: If the caster is overburdened they may leave some items behind at the spot where the spell was cast.
